duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all operational functions at all Evoque locations and manage all hands-on operational aspects of the company.
Collaborate with the CEO to develop corporate and operational strategies and facilitate these efforts across all operations.
Responsible for the measurement and effectiveness of all processes internal and external, and provide timely, accurate and complete reports on the operating condition of the Company.
Motivate and lead a high-performance management team, mentor direct reports, and provide direction to a service organization that mirrors the adopted mission and core values of the Company.
Remain knowledgeable of market and industry trends, competitors, and all aspects of Evoque’s market.
Represent the Company at various community activities; meet and network regularly with business leaders in the community.

Establish key performance indicators for management of the operations group, responsible for capital planning and expenditures, and establish compensation, training, short and long-term goals for the operations groups.
Gather and analyze customer trends to assist in developing corporate strategy.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree from a four-year university or equivalent experience; additional education is preferred. Experience working in the data center industry in a senior management role is required.
